creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: fan shape with line of mice wearing black coats; some standing, sitting and reading; one mouse holding a lamp
marks: Signature and Stamp LLC below fan, in pencil: [H. Guerard]; LRC, in th
title: Fan with Mice
